MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Biology | b: Chemistry | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Genetics | d: Ecology

MCQ: What is the basic unit of life that processes hereditary information encoded in genes?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Tissues

MCQ: What is important to life as it allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Photosynthesis | c: Respiration | d: Digestion

MCQ: How long ago did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 billion years ago | b: 2.5 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 5 billion years ago
